## MatchByPlayerOptions interface

Additional options for filtering a specific summoner's matches.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface MatchByPlayerOptions 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [count?](./shieldbow.matchbyplayeroptions.count.md) | number | <i>(Optional)</i> The maximum number of matches to return. |
|  [endTime?](./shieldbow.matchbyplayeroptions.endtime.md) | number | <i>(Optional)</i> Only return matches before the specified timestamp. |
|  [queue?](./shieldbow.matchbyplayeroptions.queue.md) | number | <i>(Optional)</i> Only return matches with the specified queue type (numerical queue ID). |
|  [start?](./shieldbow.matchbyplayeroptions.start.md) | number | <i>(Optional)</i> Return the matches starting at the specified index.. |
|  [startTime?](./shieldbow.matchbyplayeroptions.starttime.md) | number | <i>(Optional)</i> Only return matches after the specified timestamp. |
|  [type?](./shieldbow.matchbyplayeroptions.type.md) | 'ranked' \| 'normal' \| 'tourney' \| 'tutorial' | <i>(Optional)</i> Only return matches with the specified game type. |
